name: Jssor Slider by jssor.com
author: Jssor

sections.description:
See Demos

Jssor Slider is professional, light weight and easy to use slideshow/slider/gallery/carousel/banner, it is optimized for mobile device with tons of unique features.

Key Features

  • Touch Swipe
  • 200+ Slideshow Transitions
  • Layer Animation
  • Fast Loading, load slider html code from disk cache directly
  • High Performance
  • Light Weight
  • Easy to Use
  • Repeated Layer Animation
  • Image Layer
  • Text/Html Layer
  • Panel Layer
  • Nested Layer
  • Layer Blending
  • Clip Mask
  • Multiplex Transition
  • z-index Animation
  • Timeline Break
  • Dozens of bullet/arrow/thumbnail skins

Browser Compatibility

  • Chrome
  • Firefox
  • Edge
  • Safari
  • Opera
  • IE
  • iOS browser
  • Android browser
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.1 or greater
  • PHP version 5.3.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Automatic Install

To do an automatic install of Jssor Slider, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Jssor Slider”? and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual Install

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download jssor-slider.zip
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select jssor-slider.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
